name: Don't Eat It
description: First "complete" game I have made. I made this for the Beginner Circle Jam #4 where the theme was "Game Show". I wanted to make something my daughter would enjoy (hopefully) and she likes the obbys on Roblox, so I took that and tried to make something in the ways of a ninja warrior, mXc, type thing. I learned quite a bit making this game and tried my hand at animation, and lets be honest here failed pretty hard at that part, but it was still fun and I had a great time.
